post_title: FS: St. Louis cardinals high grade & tough backs
post_content:
Hello all,

Need to sell some of my collection to pay for other expenditures.  I’ll be sending the rest to REA in a few days - so if you’re interested please reach out soon.  Too many pics to upload but I’ll send pics if you reach out.  Listed the better cards towards the top. Not very negotiable on price unfortunately.  You can reach me at [url]paul.curlee1@gmail.com[/url] or 915-449-7623.  Prefer PayPal f&f

Cards
Willis batting - Drum - sgc 1 - $7000
O’Hara St Louis - polar bear - PSA 1.5 - $7200
Bliss - Broadleaf 350 - PSA 4.5 - $5500
Hulswitt - Piedmont 350 - sgc 7.5 - $2900
Konetchy glove above - p150 (upside down back) - raw - $2500
Konetchy hands near ground - cycle 460 - PSA 6 - $2200
Bresnahan bat - epdg - PSA 6 - $2200
Willis throwing - Piedmont 460 - PSA 6 - $2000
Steve evans - Tolstoi - sgc 4.5 - $2200
